newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Embraer wins $90 mln Portugalia order.
newsitem.headline: Embraer wins $90 mln Portugalia order.

text.p: Brazil's mid-sized aircraft manufacturer Embraer said it had received a firm order for four 50-seat EMB-145's from Portugal's regional carrier Portugalia.
In a statement Embraer said Portugalia also held an option for two other EMB-145's. The statement said the value of the deal was of about $90 million.
